value.string: Validate PO Number, Freight Amount and Tariff Amount Task - Started

value.expression: File: "$vInvoiceFileName$"  -  PO Number: "$vPONumber$" and Packing Slip Number: "$vPackingSlip$".

value.string: Invoice without PO Number or Packing Slip Number
Condition for Freight and Tariff made separately so that if approver can be managed accordingly.
Automation: AP 3 Way Invoice match - Need Approval

value.expression:
Hi Team,

Please find the below details of an invoice requires your approval.

File Name: $vInvoiceFileName$
File Path: $vFolderNeedApproval$\$vInvoiceFileName$
Freight Amount: $vFreightAmount$
Tariff Amount: $vTariffAmount$

Note: 
1) Kindly move the invoice from "Need Approval" folder to "Approved" folder once the invoice is approved.
2) Reply on this email is NOT required.

Regards,
Bot

value.string: Automation: AP 3 Way Invoice match - Need Approval
